name: Scott Wayne
description: It is difficult for me to describe myself in a sense because what one thinks of themself isn’t necessarily how others preceive you. I consider myself outgoing, but I am shy sometimes until I get to know you. I am honest, loving, affectionate, can be very spontaneous, fun to be around and have a great sense of humor. I am an avid sports fan. I would be your best side kick at a sporting event. I am fairly independent. I can even change my own oil and a flat tire if I have to. My favorite time of the year is the summer time because I love the lake, beach, and most anything in the sun. Of course the mountains are beautiful and enjoying the thin air and beautiful country really makes me feel good as well. I am looking for someone that has an outgoing personality and knows how to laugh
